project.description: Single job to run the manage project: /mnt/nfs/shared/Harvester_Coverage/VcTools.vcm

com.vectorcast.plugins.vectorcastexecuti.unixCommand: #!/bin/bash echo "select count (*) from files;" echo "1835" echo "select count (a.FILEID) from files a INNER JOIN COMPILATION b INNER JOIN commands c on a.FILEID=b.FILEID and b.cmdid=c.cmdid and c.cmd like %gcc.exe%;" echo "1" echo "select count (a.FILEID) from files a INNER JOIN COMPILATION b INNER JOIN commands c on a.FILEID=b.FILEID and b.cmdid=c.cmdid and c.cmd like %cl.exe%;" echo "1830" echo "select count (*) from commands;" echo "7079" echo "select count (*) from comment_density;" echo "1761" echo "select count (*) from vcmetrics;" echo "7780" echo "select count (DISTINCT FILENAME) from vcmetrics;" echo "1350"
